children.value: Change events represent service changes such as deploys, build completion, etc., providing contextual information that is critical during incident triage or hypercare. They can be sent via specific integrations, and they do not create alerts, incidents or notifications. Change events can be viewed within individual servicesâ€™ Recent Activity timelines, on incidents and all historical changes can be viewed and filtered in the Recent Changes tab of the Service Directory.

integrations. Follow instructions in the linked integration guide to configure change events.
changes to the branch that you are tracking and change events will be sent to the integrated service.
